EmailTemplate.subject: Is your Self-Checkout hardware PCI compliant?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
With POS Ready 7 end-of-support around the corner (October 21, 2021), PCI compliance is top of mind for many retailers.
Without security updates, your retail environment might be unable to achieve PCI compliance – check out section 6.2 of the PCI compliance documentation <[[https://www.pcisecuritystandards.org/documents/Prioritized-Approach-for-PCI_DSS-v3_2.pdf]]>. Security isn’t a guessing game, and we’re here to help. Want to learn more and understand options you have, to secure your Self-Checkout environment? Reply to this email <[[mailto:Jimmy.Staiti@ncr.com]]>.
Best,Jimmy Staiti Retail Specialist, NCR Corporation
